name: SKRepeatMode
desc: The modes used to determine how the sequence repeats.

items.name: case clamp
items.desc: When a sample is calculated, the time value is clamped to the range of time values found in the sequence. For example, if the last keyframe’s time value is 0.5, a sample at any time value from 0.5 to 1.0 returns the last keyframe’s value.

items.name: case loop
items.desc: When a sample is calculated, the sequence loops back to the beginning of the sequence. For example, if the last keyframe’s time value is 0.5, then a sample at any time value from 0.5 to 1.0 returns the same value as the sequence did from 0.0 to 0.5.
